name: One Vision
wikiSummary: "One Vision" is a song of the British band Queen . The song originally began as a song written by Roger Taylor about Martin Luther King, Jr., including lyrical references to King’s "I Have A Dream" speech, delivered on the steps of the Lincoln Memorial in Washington, D.C. in 1963. As evident in the "documentary" filmed of the "making of" the song, he other three members of the band provided their input, though the lion's share of the editing was due in part to Freddie.
